meaning_str.bing:
adj. 附近的；邻近的
adv. 在附近；不远
网络. 就近；左近；不远的

邻近的；临近的；接近的；毗邻的；相邻的

1.en: Luckily the frog, who had been hunting butterflies nearby, saw him and with all his strength pushed him back into the pond.
1.cn: 幸运的是，青蛙正好在附近捕蝶，他看见了鲦鱼，于是用尽全力把他推回到了池塘中。

2.en: It had been planned that the tunnel would reach into a nearby forest, but the first man out emerged just short of the tree line.
2.cn: 原本计划是让隧道延伸至附近的一片森林中，但头一个爬出去的人却正好在树林边缘外现身。

3.en: Colonel Qaddafi decided it was time to leave, and planned to flee to one of his houses nearby, where he had been born.
3.cn: 卡扎菲做出的决定是，到时候该离开了，他计划逃到他出生时所在的那处房子。

0.en: Nearby, Kensington Palace is open to the public year-round.
0.cn: 附近的肯辛顿宫全年开放给公众参观。

1.en: I found a tattoo shop nearby. It has four stars on Yelp, and it has military discount.
1.cn: 我找到附近的一家纹身店，大众点评上四颗星，军人还享有折扣。

2.en: To watch him looking at a car? Well, not quite. He's driving it round some track nearby. At Catterick.
2.cn: 去旁观他看车？也不是，他会到附近的车道上开开，在卡特里克。

3.en: Then we took a romantic walk to a nearby research lab, where we trashed the place and freed 20 monkeys.
3.cn: 我们散步到附近的研究室，我们闯进里面，放走二十只猴子。

4.en: He tried to explain it to me. It shows you pictures of people nearby, you swipe them around, it looks kind of like a game.
4.cn: 他试着跟我解释过，上面会显示出附近的用户，你能左右滑动换人看，看起来像个游戏。

5.en: Set aside a day for nearby Captain Cook village. In 1779, the famous English explorer was killed right here in Kealakekua Bay.
5.cn: 预留一天到附近的库克船长村游览。1779 年，这位著名的英国探险家在基亚拉凯库亚湾被杀害。

6.en: While nearby in the Malay and Muslim quarter of Kampong Glam, the streets are a treasure trove of handicrafts from the Arabian world.
6.cn: 在附近的甘榜格南马来人与穆斯林广场，街道两旁有许多贩卖手工艺品的摊贩，等待您发掘阿拉伯世界的宝藏。

7.en: We should get some rest. Find a local inn, or B&B nearby.
7.cn: 我们该去休息了，找家当地旅馆或是商务酒店。

8.en: A nearby cell sees the warning and immediately goes into action.
8.cn: 旁边一个细胞看到了这个警示，立刻开始行动。

9.en: There were 20 boats floating nearby and only one came back. One.
9.cn: 附近有二十艘救生艇，只有一艘回头，一艘。

10.en: And you got my number. Most of my other patients are nearby, so I'm never far away.
10.cn: 你有我的号码，我的其他病人都住这附近，我不会离太远。

11.en: And this is what happened when interstate 30 connected it to nearby Dallas and Fort Worth.
11.cn: 这是在30号洲际公路连接达拉斯和沃斯堡附近时发生的事。

12.en: The manure gets collected in the barns and pumped to a nearby storage tank called a digester.
12.cn: 在畜棚里收集粪料然后抽到旁边的叫做蒸炼器的储蓄槽。

13.en: Why not? We don't know. We had a unit nearby that heard the blast, went in to help. Russians turned them away.
13.cn: 为什么？我们不清楚。我们有个小队在附近，听到爆炸想进去帮忙，俄国人拒绝了。

14.en: You're gonna be thinking about where to go to college. Stockholm University so I can be nearby to pick up my Nobel Prize.
14.cn: 你们会开始考虑要进哪一所大学。我要去斯德哥尔摩大学，因为这样我就离我的诺贝尔奖近一点。

15.en: Tony! Why on earth are you here? Did you leave something behind? No, I had some business nearby, so I thought I'd look in.
15.cn: 托尼，你怎么来了落下什么东西了吗？不 ，我在附近办事， 就想过来看看。

16.en: So even though the nearby sun's pull is stronger, the earth will be going fast enough that it overshoots and ends up farther away from the sun.
16.cn: 所以，就算愈靠近太阳，所受引力愈强。地球也会因为速度够快，以致于产生所谓"过冲"现象，且最后远远离开太阳。

17.en: The nearby tree provides shade on hot days and is also home to a delightful squirrel. Which is fortuitous because most squirrels are real jerks.
17.cn: 旁边的树能在热天提供遮阴，而且那树还是一只可爱小松鼠的家，这很难得呢，毕竟大多数的松鼠都是讨厌鬼。

18.en: Well, I suppose we can give it a look, and if it doesn't work out, I hear that there is a nearby Chinese restaurant that Einstein used to frequent.
18.cn: 好吧，去看一下也没损失，如果最后没成功，我听说那附近有一家中餐馆以前爱因斯坦是常客。

19.en: This site, from a logistics point of view, it's a beautiful site because it's adjacent to an interstate, you don't have any nearby residential, it's got dual access. It's just a terrific site.
19.cn: 从逻辑学上来说这是个很美的地方，因为处于洲际交界的地方，这里附近没有居民区，这里有双轨。 这里是非常好的选址。
